body_text:
Tests for common React components
Tests for data React components
Tests for page React components
A handful of tests for extension React components

The CreateExtensionPage tests are failing, but I'm not totally sure why.


Updates enzyme from 2.4.1 to 2.9.1
Lint and filename corrections

Renamed QueryRecipes to QueryMultipleRecipes
Renamed extension/Listing.js to extension/ExtensionListing.js
Renamed recipe/Listing.js to recipe/RecipeListing.js



This is about halfway through all the files that need to be tested, though it's pretty big already so I reckon it's ready for some feedback.
body_html:
• Tests for common React components
  • Tests for data React components
  • Tests for page React components
  • A handful of tests for extension React components
    • The CreateExtensionPage tests are failing, but I'm not totally sure why.
  • Updates enzyme from 2.4.1 to 2.9.1
  • Lint and filename corrections
    • Renamed QueryRecipes to QueryMultipleRecipes
    • Renamed extension/Listing.js to extension/ExtensionListing.js
    • Renamed recipe/Listing.js to recipe/RecipeListing.js

This is about halfway through all the files that need to be tested, though it's pretty big already so I reckon it's ready for some feedback.
title: New UI Tests
body:
- Tests for `common` React components
- Tests for `data` React components
- Tests for `page` React components
- A handful of tests for `extension` React components
  - The `CreateExtensionPage` tests are failing, but I'm not totally sure why.
- Updates enzyme from 2.4.1 to 2.9.1
- Lint and filename corrections
  - Renamed `QueryRecipes` to `QueryMultipleRecipes`
  - Renamed `extension/Listing.js` to `extension/ExtensionListing.js`
  - Renamed `recipe/Listing.js` to `recipe/RecipeListing.js`

This is about halfway through all the files that need to be tested, though it's pretty big already so I reckon it's ready for some feedback.
